item.title: Teaching
item.description: Teaching Methods Statistical Methods in Sociology I: graduate course, lab and statistics teaching assistant. Spring 2017. Statistical Methods in Sociology II: graduate course, lab and statistics teaching assistant. Fall 2016. Introduction to Social Research: undergraduate course, teaching assistant, two sections. Fall 2014. â€œTeja was an excellent TA , that made a difficult course relatively manageable. You could tell she cared about if we understood material, and she put a lot on effort into preparing for recitation.
